channel.title: Peacocks on Taipei City FC Test Site
channel.description: Recent content in Peacocks on Taipei City FC Test Site

item.title: City Take the Shine Off the Peacocks
item.description: Time: 2pm, March 4th, 2012 Venue: Yingfeng Riverside Park By Michael Christie On a bright, hot day at Da Jia Yingfeng Riverside Park, the Taipei City players gathered in readiness for the match against the Taipei Peacocks â€“ on their home turf. The surface was dry and smooth in spite of the damp weather since Chinese New Year. The wind affected the flight of the ball during the game! This was the first day of BML competition in March, and the fixtures are not yet half completed.
